note:
I work in public higher education in the area of information security and forensics. I spend my professional life trying to find needles in haystacks made of other needles.

Outside of work, I have a lot (and I mean *a lot*) of cats. (I know more about litter boxes and vacuum cleaners than you do, lol.)

I am also an amateur astronomer (12" Dob, 4" APO) and amateur radio operator (FT-950, zepp 18 feet above the ground).

I also like to cook, grill and smoke. I have a Grilla Chimp, Weber Kettle, and Pit Barrel Cooker.
